summary: A truly honest police officer is transferred to a town controlled by a gangster he has humiliated. The gangster believes he can use good power to bring down this officer who made him look foolish and weak.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Kajal Aggarwal|Prakash Raj|Sonali Kulkarni|Sachin Khedekar|Sudhanshu Pandey|Naushaad Abbas|Hari Bala|Suchitra Bandekar|Ravindra Berde|Suhasini Deshpande|Agasthya Dhanorkar|Anant Jog|Vikas Kadam|Neeraj Khetrapal|Govind Namdeo|Kishore Nandlaskar|Ankur Nayyar|Vijay Patkar|Besant Ravi|Ashok Samarth|Ashok Saraf|Jayant Sawarkar|Murli Sharma|Vineet Sharma|Sana Amin Sheikh|Harish Shetty|Meghna Vaidya|Pradeep Welankar

title: Singham
